title: ICYMI - The White People Whisperer: Dr. David Campt's Guide to Avoiding Holiday Disasters
itunes:title: ICYMI - The White People Whisperer: Dr. David Campt's Guide to Avoiding Holiday Disasters
description:
Desi Lydic meets with White Ally Toolkit founder Dr. David Campt for a crash course in how white liberals can better interact with their racist relatives over the holidays.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
